name: foto-render
description: AI Image Generator v2.0 - Robust queue-based architecture with conflict-free startup, PowerShell management, and scalable GPU workers

scripts.dev:manual: echo 'âš ï¸ Manual startup - run backend and frontend separately:' && echo '1. cd backend && npm run start' && echo '2. cd frontend && npm run dev'
scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | python -m json.tool 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend not responding'
scripts.queue: curl -s http://localhost:8000/queue/stats | python -m json.tool 2>/dev/null || echo 'Queue not responding'
scripts.build:all: npm run install:all && npm run frontend:build
scripts.install:all: npm run frontend:install && npm run backend:install
scripts.clean: npm run frontend:clean && npm run backend:clean
scripts.backend:clean: cd backend && rm -rf __pycache__ && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null || echo 'Backend cleaned'
scripts.system:setup: echo 'ðŸ”§ Setting up Foto Render (v2.0 - Robust Edition)...' && npm run install:all && echo 'âœ… Setup complete! Use: npm start'
scripts.system:full-restart: npm run cleanup:nuclear && timeout /t 10 /nobreak >nul 2>&1 || sleep 10 && npm run start:robust
scripts.help:
node -e "console.log('
ðŸŽ¨ Foto Render v2.0 - Available Commands:
'); console.log('ðŸš€ npm start                 - Choose API & start backend'); console.log('ðŸŒ npm run start:with-frontend - Choose API & start both backend+frontend'); console.log('ðŸ  npm run start:mono        - Direct start monolithic API'); console.log('âš¡ npm run start:queue       - Direct start queue-based API'); console.log('ðŸ”§ npm run test:python       - Test Python 3.13 installation'); console.log('ðŸŒŸ npm run install:fixed     - Install with Python 3.13 (bypass PATH)'); console.log('ðŸ§¹ npm run cleanup           - Stop all processes'); console.log('ðŸ“Š npm run status            - Check system health'); console.log('
ðŸ’¡ For steady power (no light flicker): choose Monolithic'); console.log('ðŸ’¡ For multiple users: choose Queue-based'); console.log('ðŸ’¡ If PATH issues: use install:fixed then start
');"
